attributes.action: IVF for women whose partner's already have children
attributes.additional_details: I am trying to get as many signatures as possible to gain access to IVF as I have been denied twice by the NHS in Medway as my partner has a child. I know I am not the only woman who this has happened to but the more signatures I can get and the more I can get this out there the more chance us women have of over turning the decisions we receive. You have the likes of Josie Cunningham getting a free boob job on the NHS and we are having our chance of being mothers snatched away from us. Let's get this out there and help all us women have the opportunity we deserve. We have a basic human right to become mothers.

rejection.details: Decisions about what healthcare services should be provided, including IVF, are made by the local NHS.  The Government plays no part in this process.
